items.title: Finnish Translation Completed
items.content: The Finnish translation has been fully reviewed and is now complete. All sections of the research paper and About page are available in Finnish.

items.title: Polish Language Added
items.content: Polish has been added to our supported languages. The translation is currently machine-generated and undergoing review by native speakers.

items.title: Estonian Translation Progress
items.content: Estonian translation is now 75% complete. Key sections of the research paper have been reviewed by native speakers.

items.title: Site Search Functionality Added
items.content: We've added a search feature that helps you find specific terms or concepts across all languages. Try it from the navigation bar!

items.title: French Translation Update
items.content: French translation is now 85% complete. Major sections have been reviewed and approved by native speakers.

items.title: German Translation Progress
items.content: German translation has reached 80% completion. Key terminology sections have been professionally translated.

items.title: Responsive Design Improvements
items.content: We've enhanced the site's mobile experience with better typography and improved navigation on small screens.

items.title: Spanish Translation Update
items.content: Spanish translation has been updated with improved terminology consistency across all sections.
